tools.description: Root - Access root previliges in termux without rooting android device
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/adarshaddee/root.git
cd root
chmod +x main
./main
tools.author: AdarshAddee

tools.name: infoooze
tools.description: A OSINT tool which helps you to quickly find information effectively. All you need is to input and it will take take care of rest.
tools.install: npm install -g -s infoooze
tools.author: devxprite

tools.name: termux-shizuku-tools
tools.description: Shizuku management utilities for Termux
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/AlexeiCrystal/termux-shizuku-tools.git
cd termux-shizuku-tools
bash build.sh
dpkg -i termux-shizuku-tools.deb
tools.author: AlexeiCrystal

tools.name: AndroSH
tools.description: Professional-Grade Linux Distribution Management on Android Devices with ADB/Shizuku Integration.
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/ahmed-alnassif/AndroSH.git
cd AndroSH
pip install -r requirements.txt
python main.py install
tools.author: ahmed-alnassif

tools.name: SocialBox-Termux
tools.description: SocialBox is a Social Media Bruteforce Attack Framework
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/samsesh/SocialBox-Termux.git
cd SocialBox-Termux
chmod +x install-sb.sh
./install-sb.sh
tools.author: samsesh

tools.name: Mr.Holmes
tools.description: A Complete Osint Tool
tools.install:
pkg install proot
git clone https://github.com/Lucksi/Mr.Holmes
cd Mr.Holmes
proot -0 chmod +x install_Termux.sh
./install_Termux.sh
tools.author: Lucksi

tools.name: infect
tools.description: Infect Any Android Device With Virus From Link In Termux
tools.install:
pip install lolcat
git clone https://github.com/noob-hackers/infect
cd infect
bash infect.sh
tools.author: noob-hackers

tools.name: hacklock
tools.description: Hack Android Pattern From Termux With This Tool.
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/noob-hackers/hacklock
cd hacklock
bash setup
bash hacklock.sh
tools.author: noob-hackers

tools.name: ani-cli
tools.description: A command-line tool to browse and watch anime directly from the terminal using online sources.
tools.install:
git clone https://github.com/pystardust/ani-cli.git
cd ani-cli
cp ani-cli $PREFIX/bin
tools.author: pystardust

tools.name: TBomb
tools.description: An open-source SMS and call bombing tool designed for Linux and Termux environments.
tools.install:
pkg install git python -y
git clone https://github.com/TheSpeedX/TBomb.git
cd TBomb
chmod +x TBomb.sh
./TBomb.sh
tools.author: TheSpeedX

tools.name: CamPhish
tools.description: A penetration testing tool that captures webcam images and GPS location by tricking targets into granting camera access via a shared link.
tools.install:
pkg install php wget unzip -y
git clone https://github.com/techchipnet/CamPhish
cd CamPhish
bash camphish.sh
tools.author: techchipnet

tools.name: snoop
tools.description: An OSINT tool for searching usernames across thousands of websites to collect publicly available information.
tools.install:
pkg install git python -y
git clone https://github.com/snooppr/snoop.git
cd snoop
pip install -r requirements.txt
python snoop.py
tools.author: snooppr

tools.name: termux-x11
tools.description: A fully featured X11 server add-on that enables running graphical Linux applications inside Termux on Android.
tools.install:
pkg install x11-repo -y
pkg install termux-x11-nightly -y
tools.author: termux

tools.name: termux-api
tools.description: An add-on application that exposes Android device features as command-line APIs for use within Termux.
tools.install: pkg install termux-api -y
tools.author: termux

tools.name: Impulse
tools.description: A modern denial-of-service toolkit supporting SMS, email, and multiple network flooding attack methods.
tools.install:
pkg update -y
pkg install python git -y
git clone https://github.com/LimerBoy/Impulse
cd Impulse
pip install -r requirements.txt
python impulse.py --help
tools.author: LimerBoy

tools.name: mrphish
tools.description: A bash-based phishing toolkit for social media accounts with port forwarding and OTP bypass features for Termux.
tools.install:
pkg update -y
pkg install git python python2 -y
pip install lolcat
git clone https://github.com/noob-hackers/mrphish
cd mrphish
bash setup
bash mrphish
tools.author: noob-hackers

tools.name: Termux-ADB
tools.description: A shell-based installer that sets up Android ADB and Fastboot tools inside Termux for ARM and ARM64 devices.
tools.install:
apt update && apt install wget -y
wget https://github.com/MasterDevX/Termux-ADB/raw/master/InstallTools.sh
bash InstallTools.sh
tools.author: MasterDevX

tools.name: Qu1cksc0pe
tools.description: An all-in-one malware analysis tool capable of statically and dynamically analyzing executables, documents, archives, and Android applications.
tools.install:
pkg install git python -y
git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CYB3RMX/Qu1cksc0pe
cd Qu1cksc0pe
pip install -r requirements.txt
bash setup.sh
tools.author: CYB3RMX

tools.name: metasploit_in_termux
tools.description: An installation script that sets up Metasploit Framework 6 to run natively inside Termux on Android devices.
tools.install:
pkg install wget -y
wget https://github.com/gushmazuko/metasploit_in_termux/raw/master/metasploit.sh
chmod +x metasploit.sh
./metasploit.sh
tools.author: gushmazuko

tools.name: TermuxArch
tools.description: A bash-based setup script that installs Arch Linux inside a Termux PRoot container, allowing users to run a full Arch Linux environment on Android, Chromebook, Fire OS, and other supported platforms without root access.
tools.install:
pkg install git -y
git clone https://github.com/SDRausty/TermuxArch.git
cd TermuxArch
bash setupTermuxArch
tools.author: SDRausty

tools.name: ubuntu-on-android
tools.description: A Termux + PRoot based utility that installs and runs pre-configured Ubuntu distributions with desktop environments (XFCE, GNOME, MATE, or raw) on Android devices without requiring root access.
tools.install:
apt update && apt upgrade -y
. <(curl -Ls https://bit.ly/udroid-installer)
tools.author: RandomCoderOrg

tools.name: modded-ubuntu
tools.description: A Termux-based project that installs a pre-configured Ubuntu GUI environment with audio, browsers, media players, editors, and VNC support using proot-distro, designed for easy use without root.
tools.install:
yes | pkg up
pkg install git wget -y
git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/modded-ubuntu/modded-ubuntu.git
cd modded-ubuntu
bash setup.sh
tools.author: BDhackers009
